name: Stonemason
description: A craftsman skilled in shaping stone; adventurers can commission monuments, repair fortifications, or discover hidden messages in ancient masonry.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the dusty scent of stone and the sound of chisels striking rock and the rhythmic work of shaping solid materials. The air carries the promise of durability and the essential nature of stone construction, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of skilled craftsmanship and the importance of creating lasting structures that will stand for generations.
